statements: UPDATE vendor_relationships SET compliance_status = true WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET contact_person = 'John Doe', contact_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE vendor_id = 2;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET vendor_name = 'ABC Inc.', contact_email = 'contact@abc.com' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET contact_person = 'John Doe', compliance_status = TRUE WHERE vendor_id = 2;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET contact_name = 'John Doe', procurement_policy_compliance = TRUE WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE procurement_policies SET policy_status = 'inactive', policy_description = 'This policy is no longer in effect' WHERE policy_id = 2;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET contact_name='John Doe', procurement_policy_compliance=true WHERE vendor_id=1;
UPDATE procurement_policies SET policy_status='inactive', policy_description='Updated policy description' WHERE policy_id=2;
UPDATE vendor_details SET location = 'New York' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE vendor_compliance SET passed_compliance = TRUE WHERE compliance_id = 10;
UPDATE vendor_details SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com', vendor_name = 'New Vendor Name' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE vendor_compliance SET passed_compliance = true, date_checked = '2022-09-30' WHERE vendor_id = 2 AND policy_id = 3;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET vendor_name = 'New Vendor 123' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE procurement_policies SET policy_name = 'New Policy A', policy_description = 'Updated policy description' WHERE policy_id = 2;
UPDATE vendor_relationships SET contact_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE vendor_id = 101;
UPDATE procurement_policies SET policy_name = 'New Policy', policy_description = 'Updated policy description' WHERE policy_id = 201;
UPDATE vendors SET vendor_location = 'New York' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE contracts SET total_amount = 1500.00 WHERE contract_id = 101;
UPDATE vendors SET vendor_location = 'New York', vendor_contact_person = 'John Doe' WHERE vendor_id = 1;
UPDATE contracts SET total_amount = 5000.00, end_date = '2023-12-31' WHERE contract_id = 3;
